Plot: Young Esteban wants to become a writer and also to discover the identity of his father, carefully concealed by his mother Manuela.
Title: All About My Mother
Actors: Cecilia Roth, Marisa Paredes, Candela Peña, Antonia San Juan
tomatoConsensus: Almodovar weaves together a magnificent tapestry of femininity with an affectionate wink to classics of theater and cinema in this poignant story of love, loss and compassion.
